definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: Then he sat down next to Voisin and began to write, carefully, without hurry, a thin legible hand.
sentences.chinese: 他不慌不忙，认认真真地写下一串纤细而清晰的字迹。

sentences.english: If you hand-write your responses, please write legibly.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是手写答案，请字迹工整。

sentences.english: ensuring that the photocopies and documents you provide are clear and legible, and
sentences.chinese: 出具的复印件和文件字迹清晰可识。

sentences.english: I wrote the combination on my hand, but my hand was so sweaty it came off.I was late to every class.
sentences.chinese: 我把密码写在手上，但是手出汗太多，字迹看不到了。

sentences.english: The writing on the board has been rubbed off .
sentences.chinese: 那块板上的字迹已被擦掉了。

sentences.english: I would cry, tears staining the ink, a smudged idea of love.
sentences.chinese: 我哭，泪水把字迹化掉，把爱念涂污。

sentences.english: I looked at the 1)scrawled handwriting on the envelope.
sentences.chinese: 我看着信封上潦草的字迹。

sentences.english: Soon tears had soaked all the fresh ink of my writing.
sentences.chinese: 很快就把我刚刚写上去的字迹都浸湿了。

sentences.english: Next to her plate the woman found a beautifully lettered note.
sentences.chinese: 在盘子旁边，女人看到一张字迹优美的便条。

sentences.english: His handwriting is too spidery to read.
sentences.chinese: 他的字迹太潦草很难辨认。

sentences.english: This antithetical couplet hanging in the library was written by Lu Hsun.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆墙上这幅字迹苍遒的对联，正是鲁迅的手迹。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a corrector which can clear out writings and then performs the writings at the original position.
sentences.chinese: 一种能够清除字迹后用原笔在原处书写的修字器。

sentences.english: Next to her plate the woman found a beautifully lettered note.
sentences.chinese: 在她的盘子旁边，女人看到了一张字迹优美的便条。

sentences.english: There are also some of the Inscription, suffered wind and rain erosion, fuzzy writing.
sentences.chinese: 此外还有一些题刻，饱受风雨侵蚀，字迹模糊。

sentences.english: It's getting harder to read my scribble.
sentences.chinese: 我潦草的字迹越来越难辨认。

definition: inscription with name, date, or short sentence, on a painting, gift, letter etc
variant of 筆畫|笔画[bi3 hua4]
